titles: A nevv description of Ireland vvherein is described the disposition of the Irish whereunto they are inclined. No lesse admirable to be perused then credible to be beleeued: neither vnprofitable nor vnpleasant to bee read and vnderstood, by those worthy cittizens of London that be now vndertakers in Ireland: by Barnabe Rich, Gent
author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.
notes: Running title reads: The description of Ireland.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
